entry.title: [PODFIC] eye in the sky
entry.summary:
Author: emblepods (emblebeee)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 69Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Original Summary The Justice League went dark ten years ago. The only thing that remains is the Regime. Batman, stripped of his cowl and suit, has been imprisoned on the Watchtower since the JL dissolved, forced to train the Regime’s younger superheroes. The leverage keeping him compliant? His own kids are part of the Regime’s program. Podfic of eye in the sky by TheResurrectionistLength: TBD (est. 5hrs)

entry.title: Make It Wayne
entry.summary:
Author: waynewolfling

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,470Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 183

Summary: Gotham’s most infamous billionaire playboy, Bruce Wayne, has spent years building a reputation—just not a good one. Between scandalous headlines, a trail of ex-lovers, and his ridiculous reality TV show, Make It Wayne, no one takes him too seriously. And that’s exactly how he likes it.But when life introduces him to a painfully charming journalist, Bruce starts to wonder if he’s finally losing control of the carefully crafted mess that is his life.

entry.title: Enemy Territory
entry.summary:
Author: mustangisinflames

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,981Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 16

Summary: “I've been looking all night for you. You're a difficult guy to find, you know?”The words were mild but read like a threat regardless. A burst of adrenaline shot through Batman's stomach, sparks down his spine, a cold flush he felt through the undersuit and compression gear. He had three smoke grenades left, one flash, all accessible from his right hip. A light breeze caught Superman’s cape, sent it rippling in a flow of red. Batman's barely shifted, a sturdy weight hanging from his shoulders, leather and a metallic frame beneath.“I was hoping we could talk,” Superman said. Batman gets an offer.

entry.title: Tentacles of Love
entry.summary:
Author: LadyArkin

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,904Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 95

Summary: He wasn’t even offering much more than, “I need a favor, buddy.”Batman’s marriage proposal was sudden and…strategic.Once they’ve spent some time together, Batman talks Superman into marrying for a mission. A mission that Bruce declares to be entirely selfish which he needs for business purposes. This mission isn’t supposed to be impactful to either of their personal lives.It starts when Bruce releases pictures of Batman proposing to Superman. He didn’t need more than a distraction and if it hadn’t been for an intervention from their family and friends, it wouldn’t have been. The more involved their blended family gets into their relationship, the more that they are supported in their relationship.

entry.title: Hal Jordan: The Guy Who Made Superman Cry Thrice
entry.summary:
Author: shoot_i_messed_up

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,127Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 250

Summary: Clark jerked back as if he had been shocked, eyes widening, turning back to those baby blues the whole human population was in love with. His nostrils flared. Right. He could probably smell it.After his Lantern uniform fizzled out, Sinestro had torn off Hal’s underlying t-shirt and jeans as if they were paper maché—which meant that the bites, the finger-shaped bruises, and the dried cum were on display for all to see.It didn’t take the world’s greatest detective to figure out what had happened to Hal. It didn’t take a Pulitzer-nominated journalist, either.Or, trans!Hal is raped, and to his chagrin, the Justice League--especially Clark--has feelings about it. Of course, Hal is trying very hard not to have feelings about it and in fact, has A Plan to get his willpower back. However, as every Lantern knows, no plan survives first contact with the enemy.

entry.summary:
Author: jessiwritesstories

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 101,351Chapters: 50/?Kudos: 109

Summary: Lawrusso one-shots have completely taken over my waking hours. So I'm going to make a whole book about them. These bite-sized stories are packed with everything from heartwarming fluff to gut-wrenching angst, with a hefty dose of spice—not the kind you're thinking, but the kind that brings the drama, action, and intensity that keeps you hooked. Each one is a whirlwind of emotions that I can’t stop devouring. Have fun reading!*Posting whenever I can!*

entry.title: If It Bleeds
entry.summary:
Author: lowtideblood

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,001Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 28

Summary: “You stepped down as district attorney,” Clark saysHe smiles, wanly. “Conflict of interest.”“That’s a lot to give up for just one man.”Dent shifts forward, resting his elbows on his knees. He’s every bit as handsome as the magazines say, with a clean-cut grace and an All-American smile. But he’s tired, too, Clark notes. There’s a heavy look in his eyes as he gazes out unto nothing in particular. His smile is twitching at the corners. “Bruce Wayne,” Harvey Dent says, “will always be worth it. Why don’t you put that in your story?”-Clark Kent is an investigative journalist with a penchant for sticking his nose where it doesn’t belong. Bruce Wayne is a convicted serial killer with a rap sheet almost too incredible to believe. When an alleged copycat starts chewing their way through the underbelly of Gotham, the two agree to form a mutually beneficial relationship.

entry.title: sic 'em, boy
entry.summary:
Author: Remlit

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,394Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 213

Summary: The League won't say it out loud, but there are moments where even Bruce sighs, runs a hand through his hair, and thinks 'Wow. Isn't it great he's on our side?'(Written for the April Fool's Topsy Turvy event for the Superbateveryweek Server!)
